details.description: The ICMR Intermediate Grant is open for researchers to apply. The grant covers staff, equipment, consumables, and travel allowance.
details.budget_guidelines: Budget should be as per ICMR guidelines available on the website.
details.eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a researcher with at least 10 publications in PubMed over the past 10 years and an h-index of at least 5.
details.application_process: Apply through the ICMR employment opportunities link provided.
details.documents_required: Include all required documents such as proposal, budget, CV, and publication list.

additional_information.institutional_support: Institutional support is required for study implementation. Inter-departmental or inter-institutional collaboration may be necessary.
additional_information.laboratory_facilities: Mention the institutional resources available for use in the proposed project.

name: ICMR Small Grant Call for January-February 2025

details.description: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has announced a Small Grant Call for the period January-February 2025. The call invites researchers to submit proposals under various domains of medical research. Proposals must adhere to the ICMR guidelines available on their website.
details.eligibility: Researchers affiliated with recognized research institutions are eligible to apply. The principal investigator (PI) and co-investigator(s) should have a good track record of research publications in the relevant domain.

budget.Staff/Manpower: The budget for manpower includes salaries, contingency funds, and travel allowances. Justification must be provided for each item.
budget.Equipment: The budget for equipment should include the name of the equipment, estimated cost, justification, and proposed disposal method.
budget.Contingency/Consumables: The budget for contingencies and consumables should be broken down with adequate justifications.
budget.Travel Allowance: Justifications must be provided for travel allowances.
